chapters.title: Chapter 56:  Goldeneyes
chapters.info: Faile Aybara, p. 923 (838)—Name Perrin uses for Faile on the envelope containing the letter he hoped would reach her in the event of his death. The name reflects Two Rivers tradition for a wife's name; Faile's name would be Zarine (or Faile) ni Bashere t'Aybara under Saldaean tradition. See Bashere, Faile.
